website_summaries.verdict: Choose this option if you don't want anything fancy, and are more concerned about the gadget's function than appearance.
pros: Comes in all black – an ideal color for blending with almost any cell phone or case
One of the brand's lower-priced models
cons: Adhesive has been known to get tacky, eventually resulting in the PopSocket falling off the phone

customer_reviews.title: NOT POPSOCKET BRAND
customer_reviews.text: This product works just fine so far. I'm giving it one star because it is NOT PopSocket brand as described. I cannot stand false advertisement, and if I wanted an off-brand I would have purposely bought an off brand. I detest being lied to.
customer_reviews.author: Leighanna F.

customer_reviews.title: quality reduced! not the same. look at other brands!
customer_reviews.text: whats going on pop socket?? we bought our first popsockets about two years ago and they were great. we have bought 4 since then , at different times and all of them have not stayed on...not even an hour! i would look into another brand. popsocket had the right idea, but reduced their quality and is now a waste of money. after trying 4 different times, sadly im done with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A KNOCK OFF - NOT A POPSOCKET
customer_reviews.text: Shame on you! Who posts pictures of an authentic Pop socket just to sell their crappy knock offs? HINT: if it doesn’t say POPSOCKET on the base it’s a knockoff. Send it back! If it has a foam sticker in the middle of the circle on the back - IT IS A KNOCKOFF!! I hope every reviewer that hasn’t realized you scammed them returns their items.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Will no hold iPhone 8 plus
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses popsocket for her Iphone 8plus so I decided to buy one after using her phone. After receiving the popsocket, I installed it on my phone and excited to use it. Really disappointed that it keeps on folding back no matter how I try to extend it so I can watch in landscape. Compared with my daughters popscoket, the one I had was thin and will not hold my iPhone 8 plus up. Not sure if this is fake but I decided to return for refund.
customer_reviews.author: leocan

customer_reviews.title: I received a cheap knockoff.
customer_reviews.text: 1. It has no PopSocket branding. 2. It is thicker collapsed then a genuine PopSocket, 0.36 in versus 0.25 in. To be fair it does match the page's fine print description. 3. It is very stiff to pop it out. Although, I'm not sure how hard a genuine one is to pop out either. 4. The glueing adhesive mechanism is a cheap foam tape circle. It's sticking power is weak. I would not buy again. I almost want to return it but I've wasted enough time on it writing this.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews of folks getting knock offs. But the one I received is an actual Popsocket. My wife and I have them attached to our Otterbox defender cases. They stick well.....but watch some youtube videos. Our cases really required the alcohol wipe down first on the rubber case to get it to stick well. I do not wear tight jeans....so I am still able to drop the my phone in a pocket with out hanging it on the popsocket. My wife says she is not sure how she used her phone without one for this long.
customer_reviews.author: Camhannally

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stick!!!
customer_reviews.text: Came with the sticker off. Doesn't stick at all! IT SUCKS!! Got a replacement, the robber isn't well made. So the phone doesn't stay when I open the popsocket, it closes and doesn't stay open. This is awful. The first one came without the sticker, the replacement doesn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $$
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Doesn’t extend very far so if you have adult sized fingers it isn’t as comfortable to hold. Also, the base doesn’t have the same branding on it as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! Not made like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one a few years back and it worked amazing never a problem and the sticky never even came close to coming off it stayed strong after everyday use till the day I upgraded my phone, I got the new iPhone XR today and got a pop socket from here to put on my new case, a couple hours in and it’s already falling off it didn’t even last half a day and once it comes off the already bad sticky becomes even less sticky and it’s just a literal waste of 10 bucks save yourself the trouble
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive lasted less than 4 hours. I don't know what a real popsocket is supposed to feel like, but it's clear after reading these reviews, I was sold a knock off. What is Amazon doing to fix this problem? Plastic is flimsy, hollow and seems like it would easily crack. Sticky pad stopped working within hours of applying. Save your money, it's not worth the chance of getting ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: shedaisy

customer_reviews.title: I have now gone through four pop sockets in three months
customer_reviews.text: I really used to like pop sockets. I had two on my last phone for over a year with no issues. I got a new case and two new pop sockets. Those lasted for 10 days. I bought another set the same thing happened. In the past four months, My phone doesn't have them on the back anymore because the rings detach from the sticker or the cap pops off the end. I purchased two generic pop sockets from Eastern Europe for my 12-year old son's phone four months ago and he's had no issues. He's a heavier phone user and had no issues. I'd look elsewhere as these won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: PopSockets? More like PopSoff-it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed....I brought this PopSocket after a colleague recommend it....but the PopSocket continually pops off my phone! I haven't dropped my phone yet but there's no way I'm taking a chance. I'll have to buy some sort of superior adhesive to get this thing to stay on or buy a different brand...boo. I read and complied with all of the companies' suggestions, but nothing works. The PopSocket is very sticky, has not been exposed to air for longer than a few seconds, and isn't dirty...yet it Pops off while holding or using as a stand ...so frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Baresbcute

customer_reviews.title: Got a Dud that won't stay attached!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace the plastic disk of one that had cracked and then broken in two. That item lasted more than 6months and so I ordered a replacement. This one will not stay in place and kept popping off. I would reapply it, it would stay a few hours and pop off again and agan. Now it won't reattach at all. Very disappointed in this one. I do however intend to try another one, hoping this one was just a dud! I really like the product when they work as described!! Will update rating when next one comes in.
customer_reviews.author: TLight

customer_reviews.title: Broken after <24 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: I do not think these are authentic PopSockets. The top broke off the day after I applied this to my phone.. and not at a point it can be snapped back on (the actual plastic snapped). How did it break? The "poppy-silicone" part of the attachment was so stiff, it required a significant amount of pressure to pop it up and down. It also was too stiff to put it in the prop position which is the primary reason I prefer having a PopSocket. I am very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Pearce

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these pop sockets. One came looking well and the other was missing the headset. The pop socket that came well did not feel durable and it felt cheap. I went to target the same day to buy another pop socket and it felt different from the one I ordered online. I would recommend going to target or Walmart to buy the pop socket (only $9), rather than buying it online, waiting for it to come and be disappointed when it arrives. I returned the defective pop socket and I'm waiting for my refund. I would have returned both of them but unfortunately, I had already applied the other one on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received a fake. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: I received a fake. I suspect many of the negative reviews are for a fake item as well, because the comments don't match up with the real experience (I had one prior and was replacing). The base is not stamped with logo, and it does not collapse as compact as the real one does. The base and adhesive are different too. Will be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K.

customer_reviews.title: Matte Black popsocket
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what it is about this particular popsocket, but the plain matte black feels cheap, isn't comfortable to hold (feels like very hard plastic, instead of softer plastic), and does not prop my phone up on its side like others with a design on them do. When I applied it to my phone I really thought it wasn't an authentic popsocket brand. Idk, hard to explain but I ordered another one with a design and it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and unreliable! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this flimsy product. I purchased it four times and regret spending money for it. More than that, I feel bad for recommending it to someone when I bought it for the first time. Unfortunately it does not hold up well, it does not adhere to the phone, it keeps slipping off when you talk on the phone for more than five minutes. Above everything it has no durability. Please do yourself a favor and buy a sturdy, quality product that will last you at least once.
customer_reviews.author: Dhwani Parikh

customer_reviews.title: Fell off every ten minutes. Then it made me ...
customer_reviews.text: Fell off every ten minutes. Then it made me drop my phone and crack it. Then of course as that happened it had to roll away off a ledge into train tracks. So yeah me no likey.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle's Honest Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick
customer_reviews.text: This is my second popsocket. The first one I bought lasted for over 2 years, I only purchased this new black one because my other one was white and very worn and dingy. After about one hour of being stuck to my phone, this new popsocket has come off twice. I used to use my old one as a handle while walking, swinging it back and forth and it never so much as jiggled it was very sturdy and strongly adhered. I have to assumed something has changed with the product, not nearly as sticky. Waste of $10.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $9.99
customer_reviews.text: I just picked this up from the mail this morning, carefully affixed it to the back of my phone, only to have it break 6 hours later! How this company is charging $9.99 for a product that breaks in 6 hours is astonishing! This popsocket is definitely not recommended. Take your money elsewhere people.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pop socket for my son and once we received it we placed it on the back of his phone and the adhesive to this pop socket would just not stick. He Didn’t even get to enjoy it for a day. This is a Horrible product to advertise for a good quality item when it is clearly not good quality. I have purchased pop sockets in the past (at the mall) and did not have this problem. Very disappointing and frustrating. I will not repurchase this item again. This product doesn’t even qualify for a one star, only reason that i entered a one star was because it wouldn’t let me submit the review without choosing a star.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered from this same manufacturer before and had no issues, but this one (Black) was a little different. The glue on the back of the pop socket barely worked, so I had to use gorilla glue for it to stay. The durable circle kept falling out from the rubber extension, even if I was just holding my phone. And the material did not do well with my nails. Scratches showed up immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Bush

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing when I bought it the first time back in January 2019. Ive unstuck it multiple times and it suck back and stayed. That being said, I'm pretty rough on popsockets so I needed to buy one (Oct 5 2019) and I bought it from the SAME company a new expecting to have the good quality had before. That was same not the case. The quality of this product has went down DRAMATICALLY. It absolutely will not stay stuck on my phone. I've dropped my phone twice and cracked my screen protector because it came unstuck. I will be contacting customer support because this is bullsh*t
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyn

customer_reviews.title: Not really a good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pop socket for my Iphone because a friend had a different brand on their phone and I kinda liked it so I purchased this one, I cleaned my plastic phone case and stuck it to my phone case and for the day it was somewhat useful and then all of the sudden I was using it and it unstuck, I dropped my phone and was definitely disappointed so I stuck it back on but was not confident anymore and then it unstuck again so I knew then it was not going to stay on so I gave it one more try and in a few minutes it unstuck again so I would not recommend this product, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Counterfeit Pop Socket?!
customer_reviews.text: Item was returned. Needed for new phone case (Tech21). Pop Socket appeared authentic. Packaging looked authentic. Installed like authentic. Popped open, but interior plastic was so soft it was unusable: wouldn’t balance between fingers correctly, and iPhone would not sit in side-tilt for binge-watching Netflix. Bought locally instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money, these are not legit pop sockets. I placed it on my phone and every time I would go to open the pop socket would come off. Would try and press on again as much as I could and it would still manage to unstick. I went to Best Buy bought an actual pop socket and It worked perfectly fine. Definitely would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability adhesive only lasted less than two months.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second popsocket I've used. The first one I got as a free promo item from Lenovo at work, That one lasted over 6 months. After a fairly good experience with the first one I purchased this black popsocket which received it on OCT. 17 2018 today is NOV. 27 2018 and the popsocket adhesive is already coming up and the popsocket is close to coming off. I have to reapply pressure to get it to stick back down every few minutes of using my phone otherwise it will come off. Poor quality adhesive for regular use very disappointing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick well to Otterbox Defender cases
customer_reviews.text: I used this with an Otterbox Defender case and it does not stick well. It just randomly peels off when I’m using it. Same problem with one that I bought for my mom, also with a Defender case. I have added new sticky circles, same problem. My mom finally used Gorilla Glue to keep hers on. I did not have the same problem with one that I put on an Otterbox Commuter case, so the problem is more a compatibility issue than with the Pop Socket product. But people should know not to expect a good stick on the Defender cases or cases made of similar material.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out! Doesn't stick well at all
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when you are using this, and don't rely on this product to hold your phone up on its own. I learned the hard way multiple times. Even after I cleaned the back of my phone case, the adhesive did not want to stick. A light pull and it would come right off. If I held it too long it become unstuck from the case right in my hand. Do yourself a favor and purchase something more sturdy. My spouse also bought one for his phone, and no longer uses his as well due to the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kagimoto

customer_reviews.title: I'm now addicted to it and I don't mind it :)
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday since I installed this on my iPhoneX. Since my iPhone X is too big and heavy compares to the previous versions, it' hard to take selfie or hold it with one hand when laying down. But with PopSocket, it made it possible and easy. It's easy to install, made well with good materials, holds well on your phone, and so comfortable to hold only with my one hand. And once it's squeezed back, it's not too bulky either. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LA John

customer_reviews.title: A phone stand that won’t stand up.
customer_reviews.text: The pop socket I received won’t stand up. I just put it on and from the very first time using it as a stand, it totally failed. When using as a stand, it collapses down to the first popout with the slightest touch of my phone screen. When it collapses down the whole phone falls to its back then the pop socket collapses further down to the flat position.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: i'm glad it's ADD-proof
customer_reviews.text: i have ADD and often find myself unconsciously messing with this thing... so i've put a lot of needless "miles" on it by collapsing and uncollapsing it. i expected with this amount of use it would have at least lost some of its strength but it has not. if it did, i would probably still rate it 5 stars and admit i probably had it coming lol. i'm glad it's ADD-proof, a lot of things aren't
customer_reviews.author: Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I want it for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in June 2018 and I’m still using it. It works great. I love having something to hang on to. It doesn’t work that well with tilting my phone so it rests on the table and I can watch something. I’m not explaining that well. I keep mine up too now because that is where it is the most comfortable. I have taken it off to charge it with one of those wireless chargers. It goes right back on. I have recently started to have to set it so it will stick. I have had it for a while. The sticky is starting to wear off.
customer_reviews.author: goht

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have arthritis or some other had condition.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for me. I have trigger finger and some nerve damage in one hand and this helps me hold my 6S+. The downside is that it makes it bulkier when I put it in my pocket, but it's a 6S+ anyway so what the heck. Also, it works great with the little hook connection that I got. I can slide the pop socket right into the hook and it holds it for me as I drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Began to come loose in less than 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: Within less than 24 hours of attaching this PopSocket to the back of my new Speck CandyShell Case it came loose multiple times. My previous PopSocket (bought at a mall kiosk) never once came loose over 6 or 7 months. Now, maybe this will turn out to be a feature: I can move it around on the case at will to meet the need of the moment. Right now, however, it looks like a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: JustaGuy

customer_reviews.title: These are stupid
customer_reviews.text: I got a bigger phone and everyone said "its imperative you get one of those." This is the worst invention ever. It sticks off the back of your phone like 1/4 of an inch WHEN CLOSED. Say goodbye to ever smoothly sliding your phone in your pocket. Even worse trying to get your phone out. The dang thing snags on everything. When open, yes it kinda helps with grip but barely. It is wobbly AF. Not worth the inconvenience of having this monstrosity on the back of your phone.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: Most important thing is that this has probably saved needing to replace my screen protector countless times. I rarely drop my phone any longer. There are some issues with adherence to phone cases that have certain finishes, but I sprayed the PopSocket with photo mount and it's been 100% sturdy. It's possible for the back to come off, as it is only held on by three small tabs, and it is possible for one of the tabs to break, which spells trouble. I guess there's a patent, as I can't find a competitive product. For now, I'm happy and I'll always have one on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected once I used the "anti fingerprint" disc
customer_reviews.text: When I first attached this to my phone case, it came off at the slightest pressure. Finally, I noticed the card labelled "for iPhone with anti-fingerprint surface". It contained a small sticky disc to attach to the case first, then attach the socket to the disc. My socket has stayed on fine since using this disc (about 3 weeks so far). The problem is I don't have an iPhone so I nearly ignored this disc.
customer_reviews.author: Darnit78

customer_reviews.title: GOOD GADGET!
customer_reviews.text: This little gem has me so hooked I cannot imagine it not being on any phone I ever have. It allows me to look things up, play Word with Friends, prop on a table at a restaurant while waiting so my grandsons can occupy themselves. So much value for so little cost. The first time I saw this on my daughter's phone it looked so silly to me - but I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: EJK

customer_reviews.title: The design is also way more comfortable to hold than the ring types
customer_reviews.text: As long as you aren't moving this thing around on your case the adhesive sticks strongly. The design is also way more comfortable to hold than the ring types. I kind of wanted to like the ring type since it seems convenient to have a way to feel like it won't slip out of your hands- but only the pop-socket design lets me grasp my phone more comfortably. This thing is worth it, I actually removed my more pricey and highly review ring type to go back to this type because its just much more comfortable to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: IF this is a real PopSocket brand...then their quality and shape has changed dramatically. It won’t stick to an iPhone longer than 10 minutes. It is smaller and harder to hold than the original version. Returning for a refund (bonus! Amazon told me to contact PopSocket directly to resolve my issue...they say it’s amazons problem. Get it together!)
customer_reviews.author: rhoma

customer_reviews.title: Fell off
customer_reviews.text: Fell off after a couple days, tried to glue it, didn’t work. I personally would have returned it but my daughter didn’t tell me till way later. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay stuck...
customer_reviews.text: This product goes not stay stuck like it says it will! I would send it back but I’ve been trying to get it to stick to my phone and it will for a little while, but then when trying to use it, it comes off. I’m thinking of using super glue to hold it in place since I use an Otterbox! I will not purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Swim

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality plastic and rubber, but the adhesive is awful
customer_reviews.text: The rubber and plastic body seem to be high quality, but the adhesive is awful. I thought maybe I got a “lemon”, so I submitted an exchange form with amazon. They shipped me a brand new one. In both cases, I scrubbed my phone’s hard plastic case with rubbing alcohol before firmly sticking the PopSocket to it. In both cases, the PopSocket refused to stay stuck. Tugging and sliding it doesn’t make it pull free, but the slightest tilt makes the adhesive break and separate from the phone. I’ll have to super glue it.
customer_reviews.author: Just James

customer_reviews.title: All of these (not just this brand) seem to have 2 major issues.
customer_reviews.text: Issue 1, The connection from the rubber (or silicone or whatever it's made of) to the beauty cap NEEDS to be glued cause after prolonged use, it starts coming loose then falls off. After I got this one I immediately super glued it as I recognized the construction of it. Issue 2, Said rubber part where it collapses has a ridge right in the exact spot where my fingers are that hurts my fingers after prolonged use. Other than that, the device is very useful but blocks the ability to wirelessly charge.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton J. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Works, but does not last
customer_reviews.text: It does function as intended, however, the socket came off of the adhesive in 2 months time, leaving the foam adhesive still on my phone. It was not a problem of adhering to my phone, it was an issue with the socket staying intact with the adhesive. Would advise against buying this brand. Update: Ordered an actual Popsocket off their website & compared. NOT EVEN CLOSE. This seller is 100% selling extremely poor knockoffs.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Makes Doing Things With One Hand SO Much Easier
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I put my first popsocket on my phone, I've never looked back. It makes holding my phone for pictures easier, it makes it easier to navigate on my phone with one hand, it helps it stand up on the table, and I love it. Only downsides are that the colored/patterned disc usually falls out eventually and the little tabs break off and I have to replace it. But I'll keep replacing it til phones start coming with them built in! Remember to clean it sometimes, because your phone is fuuuullll of gross bacteria and your popsocket has lots of little grooves where dirt and oil can collect. Gross, but true.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: welll
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a dud...I LOVE pop sockets, I absolutely have to have one on my phone...but I did have an issue with THIS one, it seemed great at first but then it started popping open all the time. Eventually it would not close at all, it would just pop right back out when trying to close it to but in my bag..but for the money I will just buy another one. Better luck next time I'm hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Poulos

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but adhesive is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in the correct packaging so I don’t think it is a knockoff. The material is great and looks as advertised. However the adhesive sucks. Not even 6 hours in and it has come off of my phone and case. I stick it back on for it to happen a few hours later. Very disappointed that I’ve wasted my money on something that won’t do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Nice pop socket for my kids phone
customer_reviews.text: My kid needed a new case and his cheap knockoff pop socket kept coming apart. Instead of trying to move it to the new case I decided to just get this. It seems like it is better quality than the cheap one I bought before. (at least it hasn't come apart yet) I don't personally use the item but it seems better than average. It did actually cost more than the ones I previously bought. I hope it holds up better.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: (Might) be hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: A tad shorter than my spin pop but that's ok because at least it stays down without crapy easy to break locks I added a metal plate to mine so I can use my magnetic car holder so that's why mine looks a little different doesn't stick to well so ordered a replacement we'll see if it's any better Update: a little more sticky but still have to use double sided tape but I'm sure this one would stick better if my case was different last one was just not that sticky though
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: Does not last very long
customer_reviews.text: I attempted this popsocket twice - and both times it failed me. First, the popsocket lost its adhesive material after two months, resulting in me dropping my phone as I held it from the socket. I had only ever had placed it on once and was not moving it around. The second time, the loosely held backing snapped off breaking two of the four bevels holding it in place. Now my popsocket is without a backing and useless. I'd recommend looking elsewhere as this is not a reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that after I purchased not 1 but two of these the prices for each of them dropped from $8.00 each one to $5.00 each one. I thought the durability of each popsocket was going to be stronger as well. It is plastic like. I do like how the sticky part really grasps onto the phone. I like the nebula colors, my mom liked the black one. But I am just upset at the pricing
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Tala

customer_reviews.title: not sticky??
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time i have purchased this product. the first time, the plastic broke after normal wear and tear from 4 months or so of use. this second time i ordered it, it barely sticks to my phone. the adhesive keeps gailing and my phone will just fall off the pop socket unexpectedly. very unfortunate as i need it due to a surgery that will limit arm mobility
customer_reviews.author: oliver

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband.Like others mentioned I’m not sure this was a genuine popsocket. It had almost no adhesive, it didn’t really feel sticky. It was not as high as the Popsocket I have on my phone and that little bit of height difference actually makes a big difference, this was hard to hold. This is a $10 piece of junk. Had to go to the hassle of returning it, bought a different popsocket in the UPS store for his phone and it is much different
customer_reviews.author: Abby Ward

customer_reviews.title: Falls off
customer_reviews.text: This definitely is not as good as other pop sockets I have used. I can sometimes feel the base moving around as I hold my phone. I will have to stop using the pop socket for a few minutes and hold my hand around it to reapply it to my phone. I’m afraid it’s going to fall off and I’ll drop my phone and crack the screen badly. A pop socket tHat doesn’t stick is fairly worthless. It does feel comfortable and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: California Dreaming

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE PLEASE DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: WORST WORST WORST POP SOCKET EVER!! I hardly ever leave negative reviews but pléase DO NOT BUY this!! This does NOT stay on!! I had my previous pop socket for 2 years but they don't make that one anymore. The first day with This one it came off .. Gave it the benefit of the doubt and put back on for 24 hours and did not pull and one hour later it came off again..I've tried sticking it on several times and it just keeps coming off.. SO DISSAPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: 1st time user very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how people are getting fake popsockets but mine says popsocket’s website on it so at least I think it’s real. Well for a first time user I wasn’t entirely convinced on the usefulness of this until I dropped my phone on my lip. Ever since that day I knew I had to trust in popsocket and I did and I’ve not been let down since. It’s pretty sturdy for some adhesive that’s protecting a $1,000+ device so I hope it doesn’t all of a sudden give way one day and drop my phone. Otherwise it’s a great little tool that isn’t really needed but the extra grip it provides can be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Soler

customer_reviews.title: Great help for sturdy grip when taking selfies
customer_reviews.text: Love my popsocket! I used mine for 4 years before it broke. I would pull it in and out at least 10 times a day if not more. It helps me hold my phone much easier without fear of dropping especially because I have one of the bigger phones. Definitely helps with taking selfies and is super sturdy. I'm on my second popsocket and just removed it from my old phone and reapplied it to my new phone and it still works great! Sticks to my new phone as if it were brand new. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tien T

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The glue on this pop socket was not sticky enough. We purchased this for a new phone and it did not stay on. I have never had this problem with my other pop sockets and they have all outlasted the phones they are attached to.
customer_reviews.author: Xility

customer_reviews.title: sticky glue
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product for my iPhone X Max. But, when I attached it on the back of my phone, it came out after a couple of seconds. I've tried it so many times but it didn't work. So, I've wasted my money to buy this product. I don't wanna return it because I've opened it. If I knew that, I never bought it. I gave one star because there is no negative rating system.
customer_reviews.author: Tonmoy A.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE OR GARBAGE?!!(
customer_reviews.text: ADHESION?!- not at all! I put it on a brand new OTTERBOX case (after prepping with alcohol and drying), it lasted 4 days and than just simply fell off! Luckily, it happened, when my phone was on a bed, so I didn't drop it and break my phone! $10 for 4 days + broken phone? - NOT WORTH IT! DON'T BUY IT! P.S. Maybe it was fake? - I don't know but it was sold and shipped by AMAZON, not the other sellers!( VERY UPSET!
customer_reviews.author: Aniri Noslo

customer_reviews.title: I want my money back.
customer_reviews.text: This thing wouldn't stick. I have another PopSocket that I got from their website that worked great for two years, repositioned several times and over four phone cases. The top part has four little prongs that help it sit inside of the collapsible part. One of the prongs broke which is why I tried to buy this from Amazon. The sticky part didn't stick. Not once. I washed it like four times over a week's time, carefully following instructions. I would have returned it but can't get to the Amazon store because of COVID19 and don't have a printer.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Bought , returned one.
customer_reviews.text: This does not work to hold up my phone as advertised. It collapses every time. Had I not attached one to my phone, I would have returned both. It does make it easy to hold the phone, but it falls every time I try to prop it up. There must be a stronger brand and design out there since the concept is a good once.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase this pop socket
customer_reviews.text: This was a horrible purchase. Within the 2nd day, the black circle on the back of the pop socket came off and I had to put it back on (takes a good 15 seconds when it happens). I’ve had to do this continually the entire time I’ve had it. I’ll never buy one from here again
customer_reviews.author: flyboy165as

customer_reviews.title: Like it...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on my phone case for a couple of months now, and it has held up well, especially considering that I constantly fool with it (nervous habit!) Helps hold the phone, especially when fully extended. I also have the popsocket holder for my car. Thought I was being smart by putting it in the center of the steering wheel...bad idea, because it doesn't hold the phone in place when turning - the phone falls right out!
customer_reviews.author: RR Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Editted review, changed 1 star to 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I've since updated my original 1 star to 4, the additional included adhesive plastic that was meant for iPhones became useful for my pixel 3 case which not cooperating with the pop socket, but after applying the little plastic piece and waiting a week or so, the pop socket has stayed on without any issues at all. This product didn't last a day before the adhesion failed. I had it on my phone for 2 hours. I made sure the back of my phone was clean, but it moved away (edit)
customer_reviews.author: Armel

customer_reviews.title: Nothing a little glue can't fixs🙆‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Is exactly what I wanted solid black. I didn't placed it on the phone...but on the back of the case I purchased for the phone....Loved it !! But if the phone starts to gets warm it pops off and it kept happening . so I just added little dot of glue it's been on ever since even after my phone got warm It held fine. There should be alot more sturdiness on the self adhsive. But I still would buy this brand. Again since this was the only one I had a slight issue but not enought for to send it back.. I loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E Castro

customer_reviews.title: The Negative Reviews Are Right
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive doesn't work for more than 10 seconds so I had to superglue it in place. It barley works as a stand as well. My old one was falling apart so I got a new one and made a mistake by getting whatever the hell this brand is.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a week then fell off.... Super Glue is your friend
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this and I did for the first week cause it worked like a charm! But out of nowhere it fell off and never really stuck the same. I'm so sad. I tried the watering thing where you water the back and let it dry for a couple minutes and then stick it back on and it never stays. Just ended up super gluing the thing on my case...
customer_reviews.author: H. FrielTop Contributor: Korean Beauty Products

customer_reviews.title: Not adhesive
customer_reviews.text: This pop socket was great except it doesn’t stick to my case well. I previously had an “off brand” pop socket that I bought in June 2018 and it never once came off. It was the best pop socket ever. But I got a new case and so just left the old one on that case and bought this one to put a customized ETSY sticker on. But I’ve had it on since last night and it is constantly popping off and will not stay on no matter what. Very sad about this. Don’t want to buy another here so guess I will just have to go to a store and buy a plain one and replace the tops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real PopSocket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as an add-on item and I'm pretty sure what I received was not the name brand PopSocket. There was no logo on the item like you can see in the pictures and it came in a plastic bag instead of the PopSocket packaging. I feel like the popsocket I got is fatter than normal and feels more flimsy. Update: keeps falling off my phone after 3 days of using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Pop Socket failed, company came through and replaced
customer_reviews.text: No nonsense, no fancy style, just simple black PopSocket. Worked fine for about one week (after properly cleaning/wiping brand new phone protector cover), then it continually fell off, lost adhesion. Hence, only three stars. Directly contacted PopSocket, and two separate reps immediately reached out to me. Another replacement, exact style, was shipped promptly to me. One month later, no issues. Will update if second one fails. Two thumbs up for PopSocket customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RayaMama

customer_reviews.title: VERY COOL AND HELPFUL POTENTIAL BUT DIDN’T WORK FOR MY IPHONE AND CASE
customer_reviews.text: I think that the design is interesting and potentially very helpful. But if you have a case on your phone it’s tough to get the adhesion right. Plus it’s not for big fingers. I think if you have a smaller phone with either no case; or a case that’s totally flat... then maybe the item will stay on, and then the ‘accordion like’ opening could allow for an aided grip. I wasn’t able to get to this point. Great idea and I wish it would have worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Major T.Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money (Doesn't stick to anything)!
customer_reviews.text: this is a waste of money. It doesn't stick to the case, phone or any surface for that matter. Sadly, because it's only $9, I'm not sure if I want to go through the hassle of returning the product but I wonder how many people bought it and are dissapointed just like me, but they too don't bother returning it. As a result, the company/seller wins and makes a profit. I put it on my phone and it kept falling out only 1 day later. I tried it on the phone case, same problem, i touched the sticky part with my finger and quickly realized it's cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Narine Bhola

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to all the bad reviews. In less than 24 hours, the socket fell off! Tried putting it back on but it’s like any used tape, it no longer sticks. Complete was of money! I had an old pop socket that stayed on so well I couldn’t get it off my old phone so I bought a new one thinking it’s the same. Nope!
customer_reviews.author: Dgo

customer_reviews.title: Works for what was intended for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my smartphone. I also purchased the car mount to use with this. After cleaning the back of my phone with alcohol I stuck the device to it. Everything works as designed, but I feel that it doesn't extend out far enough when using. I am a man with average hands but can't comfortably hold onto the protrusion, I feel like it should stick up further. Women's smaller fingers would probably work better. I haven't used the mount yet to rate it with the mount.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Mako

customer_reviews.title: Love pop sockets but....
customer_reviews.text: 🥺 Ive had 3 pop sockets and this is the only one I’ve ever had that didn’t stick. I followed all the rules and applied it just like I did the others and it only stayed on for less than 24 hours. I even followed the wash instructions and tried to apply it to a different phone case I had thinking maybe it was an issue with the case... but still didn’t stay. No idea what the issue is.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these now and both have fallen off my phone within weeks. I ordered Another one because I thought It was me after changing cases, but the second one i ordered has fallen off as well. Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette - booksandbandanas

customer_reviews.title: Losing adhesiveness after 1 transfer
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a week and then decided to change phone cases, I transferred it to the new case (lifeproof) and it was fine for a few days but not anymore as it is losing it’s adhesive power quickly and has fallen off multiple times in a day. The adhesive was deff not as sticky after being ripped off and re-applied which was advertised. Also tried a couple tips to re-activate the adhesive but now i dont feel confident holding my phone out with only the popsocket as it could break off at any moment......would suggest buying if you dont plan on taking it off ever!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bivona

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick well.
customer_reviews.text: I revived this on August 7th, it is September 29th and it has started to unstick and fall off the back of my phone. I had a pop socket before this one that lasted over a year before I started to have problems with it. This one couldn’t even last two months. Highly recommend you do not purchase this product and find one somewhere else; especially if you plan on wanting it for more than two months. Very disappointed that the makers of this product didn’t make sure the adhesion was top priority.
customer_reviews.author: Dakoda

customer_reviews.title: Not great and would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these. The first one did okay except for the disc on the end with pop off every now and then. The second one falls off all the time. I don't know if it came with bad adhesive or what. Update: just got a new phone and a new phone case so of course I ordered a new popsocket. I don't know if they are using a cheaper adhesive on these now but this one wanted to repeatedly fall off just like the last one I bought did. Be prepared to have to get some strong glue to apply so that it will not constantly fall off
customer_reviews.author: Don V.

customer_reviews.title: i think this might be fake product
customer_reviews.text: i think this might be a fake product. the packaging looks legit, and it was sealed. but the instructions say there is supposed to be a plastic disc to use for installation, and that was not included. i worry the adhesion will not last with that plastic disc missing which, according to the directions, is supposed to go between the popsocket and the phone. only time will tell i guess.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought it again
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a while back from this seller, and it worked great until a drunk threw my phone on the ground and the pop socket broke. I liked this seller so much I got another one from them. Had this one for almost 3 months and it looks and works just as well as when it was new; adhered really strongly to the back of my phone case which is an uneven surface, and even though I fidget with it a lot, the collapsing mechanism still works great. It is a little bit bulky (maybe curved edges would be better for getting it in/out of pockets) but for the price it can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's phone for Christmas as a stocking stuffer. I asked him a couple weeks later how he liked it. He said he only used it for a day before it stoped sticking to his phone.
customer_reviews.author: KarlaM

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off; don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Would not stick for more than 15 mins...adhesive seemed thinner than previous Popsockets I've used. Went to a large box store to get a replacement & it stuck as it should. Packaging was also completely different, as was the thickness of the adhesive. I can only surmise that this is a knockoff product being sold through Amazon. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME & MONEY on this product.
customer_reviews.author: ElleMphs

customer_reviews.title: Not a true “PopSocket”
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived, and it is not what it’s marketed as, a true “Pop Socket” its the offbrand that does not collapse as close to the phone as a true pop socket does. It also gets stuck open so it wont stay collapsed which is annoying. Its not terrible, but it’s not right that I didnt get what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were girly and corny until I held my girlfriend and aunts phones who had popsockets and it's realy cool and perfect if your on your phone a lot harder to drop your phone when you have this on the back plus good if you watch Netflix on your phone this one is thin so it's smaller then you think in your pocket when it's pressed on and your not using it your hardly recognize it being there

customer_reviews.title: Update very happy
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted PopSockets directly and even though they couldn’t access my order they sent me a $15 promo code and I was able to order a really cool one for no cost! And it has held up much better. I think the first one was just a defective one. I needed a new pop socket and I ordered this one but after just a few hours it fell off and is no longer sticky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Saltymermaidmomma

customer_reviews.title: for $10 it shouldn't be falling off that quickly or that easily. im super disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this product not to long ago. Within the first 2 days it already fell off my phone. It continuously fell off of my phone multiple times. for $10 it shouldn't be falling off that quickly or that easily. im super disappointed with the product. i waisted my money on this without a doubt. the adhesive holding it together was dollar store worthy. this product is worth $1 for the quality i paid for.
customer_reviews.author: mike s.

customer_reviews.title: Helps hold phone up while on couch
customer_reviews.text: Although I originally bought this because it makes it easier for me to hold my phone in one hand, it has some other benefits as well. It’s a really great fidget toy first of all! I find myself playing with it often. Apart from that, though, what I mostly use it for (and what has made me a popsocket evangelist) is how it allows me to scroll through my phone while laying on the couch. I just pop it out and my phone is at the perfect angle for me view while I am laying down.
customer_reviews.author: BreannaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not just for selfies, y'all
customer_reviews.text: All I wanted in a phone case was a sturdy stand to be able to watch videos in landscape mode. After trying different models and styles (ring, fold-out stand), I got a regular slim case and bought this little guy here because I saw several of my students using this. I'm not the selfie type, but after a couple weeks I am using this thing like crazy to stabilize my phone when watching videos on a table or other flat surface. Getting it in black means that it's not noticeable, and my secret life as a selfie-obsessed tween remains clandestine to all but my most loyal IG followers.
customer_reviews.author: Mali Medo, Zagreb

customer_reviews.title: Horrible adhesion to phone. Not the same as past ones.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have been a pop socket fan from the beginning, but sadly, the last 3 I have had have horrible adhesion. I sent 2 of the 3 back, and unfortunately, missed my return window with my most recent one, but honestly, was so sick of going through the return process for a 3rd time that I kind of gave up hope on the brand altogether. My husband experienced the same thing with the last 3 he ordered, too. The adhesion came off while I was walking outside with one of the ones I had, causing my phone to drop on the ground and shattered the back on my iPhone. Super disappointed and sadly not a fan anymore.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: The regular popsocket sticky did not stick to my lifeproof phone case for some reason- but that extra little clear sticky that comes with it DID stick to my case (for about 4 moths) I am kind of over the case and am looking into getting a less bulky one (which is why the 4 month life span gets 4 stars). Hopefully my next case will not need that extra little disc!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fit perfect on my wife's phone case which was a hard plastic rubber type material. On my otterbox (as i had expected) it didn't adhere as the otterbox is pourous. Using a two part epoxy (locktite) applied some to under side of popsocket and it works perfectly. Love that it acts like a holder, can be compressed and can be used as a kickstand in a horizontal format.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty in Purple
customer_reviews.text: Love Pop Sockets. This didn't stick as well as my old Pop Socket so I had to use alchohol on my phone case a couple of times and also rinse off the back of the Pop Socket a couple of times too. It seems like it's finally holding better now. I love the purple bling color and I get a lot of compliments from friends and coworkers. The price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: It’s love-hate relationship
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been using mine for a while now, and it’s been good so far, my iPhone is easier to hold and it act as a phone stand BUT only horizontally. I have the IPhone X Plus btw and it cant support the phone vertically, but the product said it can support even Tablets (lies) how can it support a tablet when it can’t even support a X plus.
customer_reviews.author: Elica Nicole Banay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but might fall off
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Fits awesome. I put it right below the circle on the back of my iPhone where the apple logo is. Only problem, it stopped sticking after about a week. I was able to stick it back on but after a little while it just kept falling back off. Decided to super glue it to the back of my case. Works great now! Lol
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t stick for a minute.  Phone was clean and dry.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to write this negative review, but I tried to apply this pop socket after I cleaned my phone with alcohol and I made sure it was completely dry. It literally fell off within a minute and it never stuck again. It was a complete waste of money. I can’t believe other people are giving it a good review because there’s nothing I could’ve done differently.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Payton

product_meta.title: PopSockets: Collapsible Grip & Stand for Phones and Tablets - Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style Name:PopSocketsA PopSockets grip is more than a stylish phone accessory. It’s an opposable thumb for your phone. It lets you take selfies like a pro and share with your circle of fans, friends or embarrassing family members. It lets you text things you may or may not later regret with the greatest of ease. It lets you stand your phone up on an airplane tray table to watch a movie. When you’re done, it collapses flat like your bangs in a rainstorm. PopSockets grips are repositionable and stick to most devices and cases but may not stick to silicone or waterproof materials. The product includes a special 3M adhesive disc for attaching your grip directly to a glass-backed phone. You may also buy a separate “mount” to attach your phone to your dashboard, mirror, refrigerator, air conditioning vent or wherever you snack on content. Mmm…content. And now, a little something for all you specification geeks: Diameter: 1.56 inches, Height: .9 inches when expanded, .25 inches when collapsed. PopSockets offers its customers a limited, 3-year warranty on its products. Full warranty details are available on PopSockets’ website.
feature_bullets: Offers a secure grip so you can text with one hand, snap better photos, and stop phone drops
Functions as a convenient stand so you can watch videos on the fly
Allows for hands-free use with the PopSockets mount
Available in a broad range of styles and materials

Advanced reusable adhesive: repositionable, washable adhesive sticks to most cases, won't stick to silicone/highly textured cases. Packaging includes adhesive disc to apply directly to iPhone & other glass back phones

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
